Module com.oniverse.maze_runner
Package com.oniverse.neon_dystopia.model.levelDesigner

Class LevelDesigner

java.lang.Object
com.oniverse.neon_dystopia.model.levelDesigner.LevelDesigner
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeListener, EventListener
public class LevelDesigner extends Object implements PropertyChangeListener
This class is used to design a level.

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Field

    • LevelDesigner

      public LevelDesigner(ArrayList<Maze> mazes, LevelProperties properties)
      This constructor is used to create a maze designer with the given maze list.
      Parameters:
      mazes - The maze list. It can be used to load a maze.
      properties - The properties of the level.
      See Also:
      • Maze

    • LevelDesigner

      Parameters:
      mazes - The maze list.
      links - The link list.
      properties - The properties of the level.
